name: Fighting Soulja - Draco Edition
description:
Fighting Soulja is a new game created by Possible Network and SODMG. Developed by Brian Mizrahi.

*Become Soulja Boy himself as he battles zombies and collect coins.
*You will have the ability to use his Boxing version or upgrade your Soulja to the infamous Draco

Game Features:
- Tap Left to Shoot
- Tap Right to Jump
- Multiple Soulja Boy Characters to choose and unlock
- Leaderboards to see who is the best Soulja
